name: Angry Roar
text:
Push enemy minions adjacent to you up to 1 space.
If enraged, you may retrieve a resolved attack card.
**This round**: You are enraged.

name: Claws That Catch
text:
Before the attack: If you are enraged and not adjacent to an enemy unit, move up to 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This round:** You are enraged.

name: Jaws That Bite
text:
Before the attack: If you are enraged and not adjacent to an enemy unit, move up to 1 space.
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This round:** You are enraged.

name: Prey Drive
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: If you are enraged and target a hero, you may remove an enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Prey Abundance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: If you are enraged and target a hero, you may remove an enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Feeding Frenzy
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: If you are enraged and target a hero, you may remove an enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.
May repeat once on a different target hero.

name: Rip
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you are enraged, and the target was defeated, gain 1 extra coin.
**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Tear
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you are enraged, and the target was defeated, gain 3 extra coins; if a hero was defeated, that hero spends 1 extra ::life_counters:: Life counter.
**This round:** You are enraged.

name: Sniff Out
text: If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged; otherwise, an enemy hero in range, not adjacent to you, or to another unit, discards a card, if able

name: Eyes On The Prey
text: If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged; otherwise, an enemy hero in range, not adjacent to you, or to another unit, discards a card, if able

name: Apex Predator
text: If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged; otherwise, an enemy hero in range, not adjacent to you, or to another unit, discards a card, or is defeated

name: Instinctive Reaction
text:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged, otherwise, **choose one —**
- Perform an action on your discarded card.
- You may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Evolutionary Response
text:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged, otherwise, **choose one, or both —**
- Perform an action on your discarded card.
- You may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Prowling Brute
text:
If enraged, after you perform this action, you may swap with a minion adjacent to you.
_(You may choose to move 0 spaces and still swap.)_

name: Rampaging Beast
text: If enraged, after you perform this action, you may swap with a unit or a token adjacent to you.

name: Unstoppable Force
text: If enraged, before or after you perform this action, you may swap with a unit or a token adjacent to you.

name: Hulking Menace
text:
If enraged, **This round:** Enemy units cannot move through spaces adjacent to you.
_(They can move into, or out of those spaces, but not both.)_

name: Immovable Object
text: If enraged, **This round:** Enemy units cannot move through spaces adjacent to you. You cannot be placed, pushed, moved, swapped, or forced to move by enemy heroes. Ignore the effects that limit, reduce, or prevent movement.

name: Unround Fury
text:
You are always enraged.
While an active effect of one or more other cards is also making you enraged, gain +2 ::movement:: Movement.
